trends: There have been no other sightings in Stephenville
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Details While having a cigerette outside the college,observed Intense ball of light over Stephenville airport. It appeared to be about 5 or 6 kms away and about 2kms high. The object just kinda floated in the sky but would disappear and reappear in different locations.It was also fading and brightening as it did this. At one point it started to get extremely bright and my first thoughts were that something was about to happen, but it just went back to being dull again.This light did not appear to be a spacecraft, in my opinion it seemed to be alive by the way it moved around in the sky, it seemed like it knew I was lookin at it.Eventually the object dimmed out as it had been doing and never came back.
